title: The Care we take
creator_credit: Tim Sullivan, Bruce Moir, Film House Company and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Provides a comprehensive look at the Australian barley industry in South Australia and Victoria as controlled by the Australian Barley Board. Deals with all aspects from research and growing to marketing and final uses of barley. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Tim Sullivan, Bruce Moir, Film House Company and South Australian Film Corporation
